K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:169b-1: a'arya mah'a ra na n'a ma mah'a y'a na s'u tra /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:169b-3: 'phags pa sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:169b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo; ;'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:169b-6: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:169b-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro sham thabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:169b-9: lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:169b-10: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la 'gro ba na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:169b-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khang pa brtsegs pa chen po phyi nang byugs shing byi dor byas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:169b-12: sgo gtan legs par bcug pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:169b-13: skar khung bcad pa zhig mthong ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:169b-14: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:169b-15: gang zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu zhig byas te phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-0: gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum @170a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-1: ba skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-2: srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par byed pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-4: de gnyis las gang bsod nams ches mang du 'phel snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-5: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mnyan yod nas bsod snyoms las slar 'khor nas zan zos te zas phyi ma spangs nas lhung bzed dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-6: chos gos bzhag ste rkang pa bkrus nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-7: bcom ldan 'das gan ba der song ste phyin nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-9: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-11: 'di na bdag snga dro sham thabs dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-12: chos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la mchis te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-14: bdag mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la mchis pa na khang pa brtsegs pa chen po slad nang byugs shing byi dor bgyis pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-15: sgo gtan legs par stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-16: skar khung bkum pa zhig mthong lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170a-17: mthong nas kyang bdag nyid 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170b-0: gang zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta bu zhig bgyis te phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge @170b 'dun la dbul bar bgyid pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170b-1: gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du stsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170b-2: srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par bgyid pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang pa tsam zhig bgyid na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170b-4: de gnyis las gang bsod nams ches mang du 'phel snyam bgyid lags te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170b-5: bcom ldan 'das la bdag don 'di yongs su zhu lags so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170b-6: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170b-12: khyod gang zhig gis khang ba brtsegs pa de lta bu zhig byas te phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170b-13: gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170b-14: srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par byed pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:170b-16: de gnyis las gang bsod nams ches mang du 'phel zhes pa ni khyod kyi zhu ba bzung la spobs pa legs te dpyod pa dge'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171a-1: par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171a-3: gang zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa de lta bu zhig byas nas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171a-4: gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171a-5: srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par byed pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171a-8: bsod nams 'di la bsod nams snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te; tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171a-17: ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171a-18: shes rab dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171a-19: rnam par grol pa dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171a-20: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171a-23: rgyar dpag tshad bdun stong yod pa 'di rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171b-0: lan @171b gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171b-9: bu ram shing gi tshal bzhin du gang bar gyur pa de dag la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171b-10: mi la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos gos dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171b-14: yo byad rnams kyis ci 'dod pa bstabs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171b-15: de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang mchod rten byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171b-23: byug pa dag gis mchod pa byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171b-24: gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171b-25: srog shing kha ba tsam btsugs nas gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par byed pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:171b-28: bsod nams 'di la bsod nams snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @172a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-1: pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-2: tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-3: ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-4: shes rab dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-5: rnam par grol pa dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-6: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-8: shar gyi lus 'phags gling chu zheng dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-9: rgyar dpag tshad brgyad stong yod pa rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang gang bar gyur ces bya ba nas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-11: nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling chu zheng dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-12: rgyar dpag tshad dgu stong yod pa rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang gang bar gyur ces bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-14: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling chu zheng du dpag tshad khri yod pa rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang gang bar gyur ces bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-16: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu brtan pa dag yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172a-17: ka ba de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bee d'urya sngon po yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172b-0: khang bzang rnam par rgyal ba gser gyi bye ma brdal ba la tsandan @172b gyi chus chag chag btab pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172b-1: gser gyi dra bas g-yogs shing gser gyi dril bu g-yer kas bskor ba ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172b-3: gang zhig stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khar bzang de lta bu sha stag gis bkang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172b-4: phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul bar byed la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172b-5: gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba nas rgya cher snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172b-7: lus 'phags mo'i bu yul ma ga ngh'a'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras pha rgyun du zhugs pa bsad nas de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir sku gdung gi brgyad cha la bkur stir bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172b-12: gsol bar bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i dge ba'i las de des byas pas sems can dmyal bar lan gcig song nas las de nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172b-13: dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172b-14: sngon legs par spyad pa de nyid kyis de nas thar nas bskal pa nyi shur log par ltung bar mi 'gyur la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172b-16: kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172b-17: yang dag par khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas rang byang chub mngon du byed par 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:172b-18: rang sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te; tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-2: ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-3: shes rab dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-4: rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-5: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-7: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dpag tu med pa'i chos rnams dang ldan pa de'i phyir de la mchod pa'i rnam par smin pa'ang de ltar dpag tu med par shes par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-8: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-9: shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-10: nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-11: lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-12: byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-14: mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-17: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-18: bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173b-0: de'i phyir chos kyi @173b rnam grangs 'di bdud rtsi'i rnga zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173b-1: sgra chen po zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173b-2: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag btsal te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173b-3: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor bya byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173b-5: 'phags pa sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173b-6: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shuddha sidha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173b-7: lo ts'a ba bande dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173b-8: rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidy'a ka ra sidha dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-062-008:173b-9: zhus chen gyi lo ts'a ba bande de wa tsandras zhus te gtan la phab pa //
